_header: In holy psalter may we read
_description: William of Shoreham, Exposition of Christian Doctrine — in 6-line stanzas

BLAdd17376.First Lines:
How holsum and glad is the memoryOff Criste Ihesu surmountynge all
                    swetenesse…
BLAdd17376.Last Lines:
…Wenynge this season amonge there merthes allShuld neuer
                    discression nor appall
